item.title: Effie add a quote by Laurie Halse Anderson
item.description: "I am the space between my thighs, daylight shining through. " -- Laurie Halse Anderson

item.title: Effie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "He wondered how it could have taken him so long to realize he cared for her, and he told her so, and she called him an idiot, and he declared that it was the finest thing that ever a man had been called." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Effie add a quote by Maggie Stiefvater
item.description:
"This summer-sweet night is only one minute upon one minute upon another Beautiful cacophony, sugar upon lips, dancing to exhaustion I thought of you, before this minute upon another minute upon another Until, numb, my lips fell onto the mouth of another, and I was undone.
~from Golden Tongue: The Poems of Steven Slaughter which is a fictional book in Ballad: A gathering of faerie" -- Maggie Stiefvater

item.title: Effie add a quote by George R.R. Martin
item.description: "A woman's life is nine parts mess to one part magic, you'll learn that soon enough...and the parts that look like magic turn out to be the messiest of all." -- George R.R. Martin

item.title: Effie add a quote by John Green
item.description: "I missed the future. Obviously I knew even before his recurrence that I'd never grow old with Augustus Waters. But thinking about Lidewij and her boyfriend, I felt robbed. I would probably never again see the ocean from thirty thousand feet above, so far up that you can't make out the waves or any boats, so that the ocean is a great and endless monolith. I could imagine it. I could remember it. But I couldn't see it again, and it occurred to me that the voracious ambition of humans is never sated by dreams coming true, because there is always the thought that everything might be done better and again." -- John Green

item.title: Effie add a quote by John Green
item.description: "What a slut time is. She screws everybody." -- John Green

item.title: Effie add a quote by Kristin Cashore
item.description: "I'm not going to wear a red dress," she said. "It would look stunning, My Lady," she called. She spoke to the bubbles gathered on the surface of the water. "If there's anyone I wish to stun at dinner, I'll hit him in the face." -- Kristin Cashore

item.title: Effie add a quote by Madeleine L'Engle
item.description: "You have to write the book that wants to be written. And if the book will be too difficult for grown-ups, then you write it for children." -- Madeleine L'Engle

item.title: Effie add a quote by Charlotte Brontë
item.description: "I would always rather be happy than dignified." -- Charlotte Brontë

item.title: Effie add a quote by Anaïs Nin
item.description: "We don't see things as they are, we see them as we are." -- Anaïs Nin

item.title: Effie add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "Let us read, and let us dance; these two amusements will never do any harm to the world." -- Voltaire

item.title: Effie add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "The earth makes a sound as of sighs and the last drops fall from the emptied cloudless sky. A small boy, stretching out his hands and looking up at the blue sky, asked his mother how such a thing was possible. Fuck off, she said." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Effie add a quote by A.A. Milne
Effie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "We owe it to each other to tell stories." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Effie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Biting's excellent. It's like kissing - only there is a winner." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Effie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description:
"Kiss a lover, Dance a measure, Find your name And buried treasure.
Face your life, It's pain, It's pleasure, Leave no path untaken." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Effie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "I went away in my head, into a book. That was where I went whenever real life was too hard or too inflexible." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Effie add a quote by Neil Gaiman
item.description: "Not only are there no happy endings,' she told him, 'there aren't even any endings." -- Neil Gaiman

item.title: Effie add a quote by Vera Nazarian
item.description:
"Snowflakes swirl down gently in the deep blue haze beyond the window. The outside world is a dream.
Inside, the fireplace is brightly lit, and the Yule log crackles with orange and crimson sparks.
There’s a steaming mug in your hands, warming your fingers.
There’s a friend seated across from you in the cozy chair, warming your heart.
There is mystery unfolding." -- Vera Nazarian

item.title: Effie add a quote by Alexander Pope
item.description: "How happy is the blameless vestal’s lot! The world forgetting, by the world forgot. Eternal sunshine of the spotless mind! Each pray’r accepted, and each wish resign’d" -- Alexander Pope
